11  void SchedPoint::addServer(Server *s)
12  {
13  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
14  servers[s] = counter;
15  counter++;
16  Tick cc=s->getBudget();
17  Tick pp=s->getPeriod();
18  DBGVAR(cc); DBGVAR(pp);
19  period.push_back(pp);
20  wcet.push_back(cc);
21  U.push_back(double(cc)/double(pp));
22  }
23 
24  SchedPoint::SchedPoint(const string &name) :
25  Entity(name), counter(0),
26  last_change_time(0), servers(), period(), wcet(), lambdas(),
27  OneTaskConstraints(), exactConstraints(), schedpoints(), U(), task(0)
28  {
29  }

35  Tick SchedPoint::changeBudget(Server *s, Tick db)
36  {
37  DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
38  Tick delta_budget = db;
39  //SporadicServer *s = (SporadicServer *)ss;
40 
41  int index = servers[s];
42  double lambda;
43 
44  DBGVAR(index);
45  DBGVAR(delta_budget);
46  DBGVAR(wcet.size());
47  DBGVAR(period.size());
48 
49  if (delta_budget > 0) {
50  DBGPRINT("Positive part");
51  lambda = sensitivity(index);
52  DBGVAR(lambda);
53  if (double(delta_budget)/double(period[index]) <= lambda){
54  DBGPRINT("Less than or equal to lambda");
55  }
56  else{
57  DBGPRINT("Greater than lambda");
58  delta_budget = Tick::floor(lambda*double(period[index]));
59  }
60  }
61  else {
62  DBGPRINT("Negative part (<=0)");
63  }
64 
65  wcet[index] += delta_budget;
66  if (wcet[index] < 1) wcet[index] = 1;
67  DBGVAR(wcet[index]);
68  U[index] = (double)wcet[index]/double(period[index]);
69  DBGVAR(U[index]);
70 
71  DBGVAR(last_change_time);
72 
73  if (last_change_time <= SIMUL.getTime()) {
74  last_change_time = s->changeBudget(delta_budget + s->getBudget());
75  DBGPRINT_2("in the past, new change time at ", last_change_time);
76  }
77  else {
78  DBGPRINT("in the future");
79  if (delta_budget < 0) {
80  last_change_time =
81  max(last_change_time, s->changeBudget(delta_budget + s->getBudget()));
82  DBGPRINT_2("delta_budget < 0, new change time at ", last_change_time);
83  }
84  else if (delta_budget > 0) {
85  ChangeBudgetEvt *e = new ChangeBudgetEvt(this, s, delta_budget + s->getBudget());
86  e->post(last_change_time, true);
87  DBGPRINT_2("delta_budget > 0, new change time at ", last_change_time);
88  }
89  }
90 
91  return delta_budget;
92  }
93 
94  void SchedPoint::onChangeBudget(ChangeBudgetEvt *e)
95  {
96  DBGPRINT("SchedPoint::onChangeBudget(ChangeBudgetEvt *e)");
97  Server *ss = e->getServer();
98  ss->changeBudget(e->getBudget());
99  }

102  SchedPoint::row_t SchedPoint::SetP(int D, const row_t &period, int task)
103  {
104 
105  //task is the task being analysed
106  int n = task;
107  row_t schp, schP;
108  row_t aux;
109  schp.clear();
110  schp.push_back(D);
111 
112  DBGPRINT("Computing scheduling points" << n);
113 
114  for (int i=n-1;i>-1;i--) {
115  // for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
116  DBGPRINT("Computing aux for i=" << i);
117  for (int j=0;j<(int)schp.size();j++) {
118  Tick p = Tick::floor(floor(double(schp[j])/double(period[i]))*
119  double(period[i]));
120  if (p>0)
121  aux.push_back(p);
122  }
123 
124  DBGVECTOR(aux);
125 
126  for (int j=0;j<(int)aux.size();j++)
127  schp.push_back(aux[j]);
128 
129  aux.clear();
130 
131  }
132  DBGPRINT("Schedp son");
133  DBGVECTOR(schp);
134 
135  sort(schp.begin(), schp.end());
136  schP.push_back(schp[0]);
137 
138  for (int h=1;h<int(schp.size());h++)
139  if (schp[h]!=schp[h-1])
140  schP.push_back(schp[h]);
141  DBGPRINT("Schedp ordenados y sin repeticion son");
142  DBGVECTOR(schP);
143  return schP;
144  }
145 
146  SchedPoint::constraints SchedPoint::buildconstraints()
147  {
148  //DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
149  DBGPRINT("Buildconstraints");
150  int ntasks=period.size();
151  u_row_t curCoef;
152 
153  DBGVAR(ntasks);
154 
155  DBGVECTOR(period);
156 
157  exactConstraints.clear();
158  for (int curTask=0;curTask<ntasks;curTask++){
159  row_t schedP;
160  // compute the scheduling points
161  schedP=SetP(period[curTask], period, curTask);
162 
163  // initialize the empty matrix
164  OneTaskConstraints.clear();
165  DBGVAR(curTask);
166  DBGVAR(OneTaskConstraints.size());
167  DBGVAR(schedP.size());
168 
169  for (int curPoint=0; curPoint<(int)schedP.size(); curPoint++){
170  curCoef.clear();
171  // the current scheduling point
172  double t = schedP[curPoint];
173  DBGPRINT("Current scheduling point: " << t);
174  DBGPRINT("Now computing the coefficient");
175  //compute the coefficients
176  for (int j=0;j <= curTask-1;j++) {
177  DBGPRINT("PASA: j=" << j);
178  curCoef.push_back(ceil((double(t)/double(period[j]))));
179  DBGVAR(ceil((double(t)/double(period[j]))));
180  }
181  DBGPRINT("Now filling the rest of the vector");
182  curCoef.push_back(1);
183  for (int j=0;j<ntasks-curTask-1;j++) curCoef.push_back(0);
184 
185  DBGPRINT("Before normalization: ");
186  DBGVECTOR(curCoef);
187  DBGPRINT("Now normalizing");
188  for (int i=0;i<(int)curCoef.size();i++) {
189  curCoef[i]=double(curCoef[i])*double(period[i])/double(t);
190  }
191  DBGVECTOR(curCoef);
192 
193  // store the normalized coefficients
194  OneTaskConstraints.push_back(curCoef);
195  }
196  DBGPRINT("Finished computing the OneTaskConstraints");
197  DBGVAR(OneTaskConstraints.size());
198  //store all the coefficients for curTask schedulability
199  exactConstraints.push_back(OneTaskConstraints);
200  }
201  return exactConstraints;
202  }
203 
204  // Tick SchedPoint::sensitivity(const constraints
205  // &exactConstraints, const row_t &U, int task){
206 
207  double SchedPoint::sensitivity(int task){
208 
209  // DBGENTER(_SERVER_DBG_LEV);
210  int nTask=U.size();
211  u_row_t lambdaVec;
212  matriz curConstraint;
213  u_row_t product;
214  double suma;
215  DBGPRINT("Sensitivity");
216  DBGVAR(nTask);
217  DBGVAR(exactConstraints.size());
218  DBGVAR(task);
219  DBGPRINT("utilization vector");
220  DBGVECTOR(U);
221  DBGPRINT("wcet");
222  DBGVECTOR(wcet);
223  DBGPRINT("period");
224  DBGVECTOR(period);
225  for (int i=0; i<nTask; i++) {
226  curConstraint = exactConstraints[i];
227  DBGPRINT("curConstraints");
228  for (unsigned row=0;row<curConstraint.size();row++){
229  DBGVAR(row);
230  DBGVECTOR(curConstraint[row]);
231  }
232  for (unsigned row=0;row<curConstraint.size();row++) {
233  suma=0;
234  for (int col=0;col<nTask;col++) {
235  suma += curConstraint[row][col]*U[col];
236  }
237  product.push_back(suma);
238  }
239  for (unsigned col=0;col<product.size();col++){
240  product[col]=1-product[col];
241  }
242  for (unsigned row=0;row<product.size();row++){
243  if (curConstraint[row][task]==0)
244  product[row]=100000000;
245  else
246  product[row] = product[row]/curConstraint[row][task];
247  }
248  DBGPRINT("Product after dividing by curConstraint");
249  DBGVECTOR(product);
250  double maximo=0;
251  for(int i=0;i<(int)product.size();i++) {
252  if (maximo < product[i])
253  maximo = product[i];
254  }
255  lambdaVec.push_back(maximo);
256  //DBGVAR(maximo);
257  product.clear();
258  }
259  double minimo = lambdaVec[0];
260  DBGPRINT("lambdaVec");
261  DBGVECTOR(lambdaVec);
262  for(int i=0;i<(int)lambdaVec.size();i++) {
263  if (minimo > lambdaVec[i])
264  minimo = lambdaVec[i];
265  // DBGVAR(minimo);
266  }
267  //DBGVAR(minimo);
268  return (minimo);
269  }

271  void SchedPoint::updateU(int task,Tick req)
272  {
273  wcet[task]=req;
274  U[task]=double (double(wcet[task])/double(period[task]));
275  }
